name: Save the Hero
description:
Everyone loves the hero. He is always running head-first into dangerous caves and coming out with amazing treasure. 

However, he REALLY doesn't know how to do much but run in, head first, and it falls to you, his nameless thankless assistant, to make sure he doesn't hurt himself.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move and Jump
X Key           - Interact (with the switch

created for 1904labs winter game jam
